comment:
* Intrinsic for converting an Android YUV buffer to RGB.
 *
 * The input allocation should be supplied in a supported YUV format
 * as a YUV element Allocation. The output is RGBA; the alpha channel
 * will be set to 255.

methods.name: public static ScriptIntrinsicYuvToRGB create(RenderScript rs, Element e)
methods.comment:
* Create an intrinsic for converting YUV to RGB.
     *
     * Supported elements types are {@link Element#U8_4}
     *
     * @param rs The RenderScript context
     * @param e Element type for output
     *
     * @return ScriptIntrinsicYuvToRGB

methods.name: public void setInput(Allocation ain)
methods.comment:
* Set the input yuv allocation, must be {@link Element#U8}.
     *
     * @param ain The input allocation.

methods.name: public void forEach(Allocation aout)
methods.comment:
* Convert the image to RGB.
     *
     * @param aout Output allocation. Must match creation element
     *             type.

methods.name: public Script.KernelID getKernelID()
methods.comment:
* Get a KernelID for this intrinsic kernel.
     *
     * @return Script.KernelID The KernelID object.

methods.name: public Script.FieldID getFieldID_Input()
methods.comment:
* Get a FieldID for the input field of this intrinsic.
     *
     * @return Script.FieldID The FieldID object.

methodNames: public static ScriptIntrinsicYuvToRGB create(RenderScript rs, Element e)
